reference: Altonji, Joseph G., Fumio Hayashi, and Laurence J. Kotlikoff, Is the Extended Family Altruistically Linked? Direct Tests Using Micro Data, American Economic Review, 82, 5, December 1992, pp. 1177-1198.
Altonji, Joseph G. and Thomas A. Dum, An Intergenerational Model of Wages, Hours and Earnings, NBER Working Paper No. 4950, December 1994.

Altonji, Joseph G. and Thomas A. Dunn, Relationships among the Family Incomes and Labor Market Outcomes of Relatives, in Research in Labor Economics, Vo/urne 12, 1991, edited by R. Ehrenberg. JAI Press Inc., pp. 269-310.
